hadiths.text: It was narrated that Nu’man bin Bashir said:“I heard ‘Umar bin Khattab say: ‘I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) writhing with hunger during the day, and he could not even find the worst of dates with which to fill his stomach.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the family of Muhammad (ﷺ)
